# Hi there, I am UtopiaXC ðŸ‘‹

<p>Hello, I am from Dalian, China, a beautiful seaside city. Now I live in Tsukuba, Ibaraki, Japan, and I am doing research here for my master's degree. I worked as a senior software engineer at ThunderSoft, leading a team to develop frameworks of smart vehicles' system. Nice to meet you all.
</p>
